The benefits of using share car

Flexible can be used anytime

Share Car service is available 24 hours. You can start renting a car whenever you need it.

Practical & uncomplicated use

All the booking process until the car door opens and closes only from a smartphone.

Easy & secure payment

Cashless. With a 2C2P payment gateway, credit card data stored is guaranteed to be safe.

The condition of the car that is always well-maintained

Every day the Share Car is cleaned and maintained regularly so that it is ready to drive.

Best service in 24 hours

Customer support is ready to serve 24 hours a day. Easily accessible via Whatsapp to +62 812-9555-5927

The most economical guaranteed price

Special holiday promos until work matters are available every month.

What Are You Waiting For? Download Share Car Now!
